We are a software team that we intend to develop the Android software. In this project we have gone to the group of software that over the past decades have been attracted by all persons who were in touched by accounting. CRM : Customer Relationship Management softwares are our main discuss.
We hope this app help you Dear user in marketing, sales management and customer management. Write your feedback Enter your email address Enter Sale Code Enter Product name Enter Cost Name

To continue, enter required fields Take a Tour Add customer Add product Create Invoice and Print Add cost Change Setting View invoice and print Contact debtors View reports Tour Slideshow Next Back Cancel This tour show you how to save a Customer and see him/her in list. This tour show you how to save a Product and see it in list. This tour show you how to create an Invoice and Print it. This tour show you how to insert your Costs in list. This tour show you how to change some Setting step by step. This tour show you how to see your saved Invoices, Edit or Print them. This tour show you how to see your Debtors and contact with them. This tour show you how to see some your Dashboard about number of customers, classify and amount of their bills. Start Set Profile After set your profile data and save it, Tap the button at the top left corner to Get Started! kasebProfile Finish Add New Customer Add New Product/Service Create New Sale Choose membership Choose cost type OK Kaseb Intro Page Animation Avatar Kaseb
Example : Ali Example : Watson Example : 09121234567 Example : 2017/1/1 Example : kaseb@gmail.com Example : Samsung S7 Example : P-1 Example : 150000 Example : 15 Example : Gas Bill Example : C-1 Example : INV-1
This page show your customers And you can add a customer here! In this page you insert necessary data of customer and choose a picture arbitrary then save him/her from top right corner with save button. In this page you can see your sales, insert one, click each one to edit or print. In this page you can see your products and services, insert one, click each one to edit or add a purchase. In this page you insert necessary data of product then save it from top right corner with save button. In this page you insert a sale step by step :\n1. Add products.\n2. Add taxes and discounts.\n3. Add payments.\n4. Save it from top right corner with save button.\n5. Print it Automatically. Welcome to This Tour! To use of this app you should go this way, step by step : 1. Add a customer.\n2. Add a product.\n3. Insert Sale for a customer and print it.\n4.Check Dashboard.
